title: Dzukani Ana a Mfumu
otherDetails:
522NEH
01 NAH
Awake! Sons of the Kingdom

verses:
1. Dzukani ana ache, Mfumu yayandika
Tamandani mchimwemwe Mfumu yam'mwambayo
Bwerani muone chikhomo tayandika
Tidikiranu Mbuye, mchiyembekezero.

2. Penyanitu olira, Mfumu yayandika
Chotsani zisonizo, thandizo lafika
Mumalo oyera, chitonthozo chirimo
Chipulumutso chathu, mchisomo tipeza.

3. Dzukani othodwanu, Mfumu yili mfupi
Kondwani ozunzika, kuwala kwafika
Mbuye ali ndi'fe, ngakhale mudzipsinjo
Mchitonthozo adalitsa, imfa 'dzagonjetsa

title: Ku Zioni sangalala
otherDetails:
02 NAH
Rise zion raise your voice

verses:
1. Ku zion sangalala, ndi ntchito za Mulunguyo
Zomwe zionekera'we, m'thambo lofana ndi mdima
M'choka kuunika kwa myaya, udzapenya mwatsopano
Kuunika, choonadi, moyo apatsa
Mwa ntumiki wa kumwamba.

2. Ambuyeyo wapatsidwa, mphamvu za dziko ndł“‘mwamba
Kulamula, kotsogoza, Angelo amuyimbira
M'dierekezi saloledwa, kuzunza ndi kuopsya'we
Mtenderewo, madalitso, kuyamika kumvekadi
Mokondwa mlandire iye.

3. Chisomo chiperekedwa, mnjira yopapatizayi
Yonka ku chiombolo, mwa Yesu muli ntendere
Machimo amachotsedwa, kondwani mum'yamike
Dzani nonse odwalanu, pemphani, muchiritsidwa
Ndikudya nkate wa moyo.

title: Uka konzekeratu
otherDetails:
03 NAH
Rise prepare yourself alright

verses:
1. Uka konzekeratu, landira mfumu mokondwa
Khomo tsegula alowe, amapereka chifundo
Ukonze njira yako, m'mene adza kwa iwe.

2. Anamenyadi nkhondo, nasambuka kamba ka ife
Kupyolera mu imfa, chisomo, bata zinadza,
Kwa tate anapita, tapeza chiombolo.

3. Wolemekezekayo mlandire ndi mtimawo
Adzachezera iwe m'patse mtima wakowo
Mtima ndi maganizo, zipereke kwa iye.

4. Usamlore apite, mu chikondi m'fungatire
Mzonse khala mwa iye, usasocheretse moyo
Mwa iye udzadala lero ndi m'yaya wonse.

title: Bvalani za nkhondo zanu
otherDetails:
410NEH
04. NAH
Gird on your Armour

verses:
1. Bvalani za nkhondo zanu, dzadzani nyalizo
Ndi mafuta a chikondi, mugonje kwa iye
Mkwati adzabwera kudzatenga ache
Konzekani sadzachedwa, mvani kuitana.

2. Ndidzakonzekera bwanji kukumana naye
Kuunika kwa Mzimuyo, kudzaze mu mtima
Kudzaze mumtima, kachisi wache akhale woyera
Ndipemphera osaopa, mpaka kudza kwache.

3. Turukani panthawiyi kuitana ena
Adzaguletu mafuta akhale ndi Khristu
Omwe adikira, kunja ndi ambiri
Malo ambiri alipo alowetsenitu.

4. Ndikukondwa kwakukulu, povala minjiro
Mu dziko la kumwambako
Tidzaona Mfumu, imba Aleluya
Ambuye, tiimba pamodzi.

title: Mkwati adzakumbukirani
otherDetails:
425NEH
05 NAH
The Bridegroom comes! Remember His word!

verses:
1. Mkwati adzakumbukirani woomboledwa dikirani
Munthawi zonse monga mwamva Mbuye adzansanga

2. Mkwati adza inu osamva perekani mtima kwa Yesu
Ndipo muchoke muza mdziko Mbuye adza msanga.

3. Mkwati akudza kodi mwamva, tukulani maso mmwambamo
Yandikiranitu kwa iye Mbuye adzansanga.

4. Mkwati akudza monga bwenzi kwa iye okhulupilika
Nadzakhala m'ulemelero Mbuye adzansanga.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus :Mokondwera mumapemphero tidikira kudzatengedwa
Tidzaona ulemelero pokumana nanu.

title: Mkwatibwi wadikiradi
otherDetails:
424NEH
06 NAH
The bride has waited o so long

verses:
1. Mkwatibwi wadikiradi, Mbuye kudzanso kwanu
Mwana wa Mulungu inu, kodi mubwera liti?
Mubweretsa madalitso, ndi chani china choposa.

2. Mupezeka nthawi zonse, ananu ayamika
Tikhulupilira m'mau, kuti mubwera msanga
Madalitso mutipatse, tidzipenya nkhope yanu.

3. Tiyang'anire kosatha, tiyatse nyali zathu
Ndi mafuta anu Mbuye tiima kudikira
Tikhale okonzekera,msatope mkwati akudza.

4. Tifuna kukhala nanu, m'chipinda cha ukwati
Yesu tidikira inu, ndi zobvala zoyera
Tiyang'anira kumwamba ndi chimwemwe tifuula.
lyrics.chorus: Chorus: Dzani, mubwere msanga, kwaniritsani Mbuye.

title: Tukulani mitu yanu
otherDetails:
527NEH
07 NAH
Lift up your Heads, Ye Mighty Gates

verses:
1. Tukulani mitu yanu, Mfumu ili kudikira
Mfumu yayandikiradi, Mpulumutsi wa dzikoli
Watenga chipulumutso, motero sangalalani
Tiyamike inu, Mlengi, Mbuye wathu.

2. Ambuye achilungamo, wodzaladi ndi chifundo
Woyera korona wache, ndodo yache ya chisoni
Watenga matsoka athu, motero dziko liyimba
Tiyamike inu M'pulumutsi wathu woweruzayo.

3. Dzikoli la madalitso, kwache kwa oweruzayo
Mitima yosangalala, idza kwa Mfumu yokondwa
Iye ali dzuwa lathu, abweretsa chikondwelero
Mutonthozi wathu, mwini wa chisomo.

4. Idzani momboli wathu, khalani mmitima yathu
Tikhala pafupi nanu, patsani chikondi chanu
Ndi mzimu wanu woyera, kufikira kuchipata
Tikuyamikani, m'dzina la Mbuye.

title: Inu ana a wanthu konzani mitima
otherDetails:
09 NAH
Ye sons of men In earnest

verses:
1. Inu ana a anthu konzani mitima
M'gonjetsi wafikadi, amachotsa tchimo
Ndi yemwe Mulungu analonjeza ife
Mthandizi ndi bwenzilo
Tidziwa chifundo.

2. Konzatu nyumba yako pofika mlendoyu
Lambula njira yache yomwe yawilira
Tayani machimo, chotsani kudzikonda
Muyang'ane m'mwamba.

3. Mtima wa chikondiwo ulandira mphoto
Mtima wodzikuzawo umagwa ndi mantha
Mtima oyetsetsa kuyenda ndi Yesu
Udzala ndi ubwino

4. Wochimwa'ne m'ndikonze kamba ka nthawiyo
Mu chifuniro chanu Mbuye, m'ndiyeretse
Mupenya mu mtima mchimwemwe ndidzanena
'Mbuye ali ndine.'

title: Ndani ali pakhomo?
otherDetails:
301NEH
10 NAH
See, who's standing at your Door?

verses:
1. Ndani ali pakhomo?
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto
Agogoda pakhomo
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto
Usachedwe apita, 
Alowe woyerayo,
Ali mfumu yakodi
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto

2. Mtsegulire mtima'ko
Alowe (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto
Angapite m'chisoni
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto
Alowe, bwenzi lako
Wokhulupirikadi
'Dzakuthandiza m'njira
Alowe (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto

3. Imvani kuitana
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto
Sankha ku khala wache,
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto
Apembedza pa khomo
Adzakusangalatsa
Udzamuyamikadi
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto.

4. Usatsekere kunja
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto
Iye ali mtendere
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto
Akhulukira iwe
Achotsa chimo lako
Dzakutengera m'mwamba
Alowe, (mpulumutsiyo) Bass/Tenor/Alto.

title: Mwana wa zioni kondwera
otherDetails:
529NEH
11 NAH
Zion's daughter, O be glad

verses:
1. Mwana wa zion kondwera, ukondwe yerusalem
Wa mfumu ikudza, ona mfumu ya ntendere,

2. Tiimbe hossana, Davide, m'fuko lanu odala ndinu
Mzinda wanu ulipo, hossana Mbuye kumwamba.

3. Tiimbe hossana, mtendere, monitu mlamuliri
Mpando waima, mwana wa tate kumwamba.

title: Takulandirani
otherDetails:
12 NAH
Welcome thousand times

verses:
1. Takulandirani Mbuye, tikupatsani moni
Ndinu mwaombola ife, tidalira Mulungu
Kudzera m'mwazi wanu, mwachotsadi machimo
Minjiro yasankhidwadi, ya mkwati wosankhidwayo.

2. Mpingo wonse waimatu, pamaso panu mfumu
Wa umphawi ndi wofatsa, uyamikira Mbuye
Kanjedza m'manja mwawo, ndi zobvala zoyera
Atsogozeni kumudzi.

3. Dzani, mverani kupempha, kwa mpingo ndi mkwatibwi
Ulaliki wa Ambuye, wolemekezekayo
Titengeni kumwamba, komwe taitanidwa
Alendo ku ukwati, dzakhala naye muyaya.

title: Podzabwera kudzatenga
otherDetails:
434NEH
14 NAH
When He Cometh

verses:
1. Podzabwera kudzatenga osankhidwa ache
Osankhidwa, osankhidwa, okondedwawo.

2. Adzasonkhanitsa onse, aufumu wache
Olungama, owalawo, okondedwawo.

3. Ana inu, ang'ononu, okonda Momboli
Osankhidwa, osankhidwa, okondedwanu.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Monga momwe nyenyezi korona wachedi
Adzakongola monga korona wache.

title: Kondwerani nonsenu
otherDetails:
18 NAH
Rejoice, All Ye Believers

verses:
1. Kondwerani nonsenu, yatsani nyalizo
Usiku ukubwera, m'dima wayandika
Mkwati ali kudzatu, wayandikiradi
Limbani m'kupemphera mvani kufuula.

2. Konzani nyali zanu, konzani mtimawo
Khulupirikanitu, konzani mtimawo
Alonda aitana, mkwati wayandika
Mukumane naye, imba Aleluya.

3. Anamwali anzeru, tukulani mitu
Ndi kuimba mokondwa, konzekani nokha
Phwandolo lidikilira, khomo latseguka
Aulemeronu, mkwati wayandika.

4. Chiyembekezo chathu, Yesu adzabwera
Walani inu dzuwa, M'malowa a m'dima
Ndi mitima yoloweza, tifunitsitsadi
Kudzaona Ambuye, kukhala ndi iye.

title: Lino tsiku Mlungu 'konza
otherDetails:
19NAH
This is the Day

verses:
1. Lino tsiku Mlungu 'konza, ulemu wonse kwa Iye
Kuyamikidwe kwa Khristu, Mbuye kumwamba ndi pansi

2. Dziko lonse lidikira, kukwanira nthawi yanu
Ku mpando woyera , tapulumutsidwa

3. Zozizwitsazi ndiwona, mu mtima pa nthawi yache
Atiyimira ife kwa Iye , Mlungu wotikonda

4. Chisomo kwa wochimwawe, iye anadzichepetsa
Anabwera kulipira mmalo, mwathu kutiyeretsa

5. Mfumu yako idza Zion, ndibwera monga mwalembo
Tate kufuna kwanu, kuyamikidwe kwa Mlungu

title: Dzani okhulupilira
otherDetails:
550NEH
27 NAH
Come Hither Ye Faithful

verses:
1. Dzani okhulupirika, imbani!
Onani M'pulumutsi modyeramo
Thamangilani ku Betelehemu!

2. Mwana wachedi ndi Atate wathu,
Simunanyoza mimba ya Namwali
Thamangilani ku Betelehemu

3. Dzani Angelonu mu muimbile
Tiyimbe za ulemelero wache
Ulemelero ukhale kwa Mulungu.

4. Ambuye Yesu mwabadwatu lero
Ulemelero kumwamba ndi pansi
Mau a Mulungu ndi mphamvu yache!
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Idzani, mwansanga *2, 
Idzani tigwadire Mbuye wathu,

title: Bwerani nonse tiyimbe
otherDetails:
365NEH
35 NAH
Come everyone and Join our song

verses:
1. Bwerani nonse tiyimbe, akondadi
Tiimbe chisomo chache, akondadi
Dzukani inu ochimwa, funani za madalitso
Umawa wayandikira, akondadi.

2. Ochimwawo adziwetu, akondadi
Anasiya m'pando wache, akondadi
Onani M'pulumutsiyo, Anatifera pa m'tanda
Tamasuka Ale-lu-ya, akondadi.

3. Kondwani ali ndi moyo, akondadi
Tengani ubwino wake, akondadi
Tye ndi dzuwa ndi m'thunzi, Chikondi chake chosatha
Atisamalira tonse, akondadi.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Mulungu-yo akondadi
Bwerani nonse ti-imbe, akondadi.

title: Tsiku lokondwa
otherDetails:
555NEH
39NAH
O Thou Joyful Christmas Tide

verses:
1. Tsiku lokondwa la madalitso
Nthawiyo yosangala upandu watha
Khristu wabadwa dzani tikondwere oyeranu

2. Tsiku lokondwa la madalitso
Nthawiyo yosangala upandu watha
Kuwala kwa Yesu kutiombola dzani tikondwere oyeranu

3. Tsiku lokondwa la madalitso
Nthawiyo yosangala upandu watha
Mfumu yamafumu tigwadiranu dzani tikondwere oyeranu

title: Mtendere chikondwelero
otherDetails:
556NEH
4ONAH
O What Peace and what Rejoicing

verses:
1. Mtendere chikondwerero mukubadwa kwa Yesu
Mu umodzi ndi mchikondi tonsefe tikondwera
Timtamande timyimbire ndi mtenderewo kwa anthu padziko.
Mpulumitsi watibadwira mmawawu wa kh'rismisi

2. Mkuwala kwa miuniyo tonse tisangalala
Mitima yathu yadzadza ndi chikondi cha Mulungu
Timtamande timyimbire ndi mtenderewo kwa anthu padziko.
Mpulumitsi watibadwira mmawawu wa kh'rismisi

3. Kukondwa nthawi yochepa kwa osadziwa yesu
Ife tidzakondwerebe mchimwemwe cha wamwamba
Timtamande timyimbire ndi mtenderewo kwa anthu padziko.
Mpulumitsi watibadwira mmawawu wa kh'rismisi

title: Usiku Woyera
otherDetails:
560NEH
42NAH
Silent night, Holy Night

verses:
1. Usiku Woyera Wachete wowala
Pozungulira mwana Woyerayo ndiwofatsayo
Agona mtendere Agona mtendere

2. Usiku Woyera! Abusa nawona
Ulemelero m'mwamba, Ale-luya kumwamba
Mpulumutsi wabadwa, Mpulumutsi wabadwa

3. Usiku Woyera Mwana wa Mulungu
Akonda malo owala Chiombolo cha chisomo
Yesu Mbuye pobadwa, Yesu Mbuye pobadwa

title: Mwana watibadwira
otherDetails:
545NEH
45NAH
In Bethlehem the Lowly

verses:
1. Mwana watibadwira mu Betelehemu
Ndichifuniro changa kukhale wanudi
Ndithu ndithu ndikhale wanudi

2. Muchikondi cha Yesu ine ndikhalebe
Ndipatsa mtima wanga n'zonse ndiri nazo
Zonse zonse zomwe ndiri nazo

3. Ndidzipereka kwanu ndimvereni Mbuye
Ndikutumikireni moyo wanga wonse
Muchikondi kwa muyaya wose

4. Mwa Inu ndikhalebe mwalonjezo langa
Muchikondi chosatha ndipereka mtima
Yesu Yesu mundilandire'ne

title: Zodala nthambi za nthete
otherDetails:
10 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
Be ye Blest, Ye Tender Branches

verses:
1. Zodala nthambi za nthete, mu mitengo ya mphesa
Pozungulira guwalo, kukowa zingwa zache
Fungo lokoma likwere, mu unyamata wonse
Zingwe zomangilizana, chikondwero cha Khristu

2. Maluwa ohpuka bwino, omangidwa kwa Yesu
Chisomo chinong'oneza, mu chikho choyeracho
Chikondi cha Mpulumutsi, Satana sangadzetu
Sangagonjetse nkonse

3. Nthambi zophuka maluwa, chikondwero cha Yesu
Apatsa dzuwa ndi mvula, kuti asatisiye
Maluwawo, asafote, akhale owalabe
Ndinu nthambi za ziwisi, zipatso za kumwamba.

title: Zioni wa ulemelero
otherDetails:
17 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
Glorious Zion

verses:
1. Idzani ku mzinda wa Mulungu
Sim'natope ndi njira za dziko?
Miseu yache yadzala mwazi
Zipupa zache zadzala udani.

2. Ndikanakhalatu ndimapiko
Ndikanapitilira mapiri
Kochoka ku zopweteka za dziko
Kukakhala ku kachisi wa Mulungu.

3. Kulibe opemphapempha uko
Uchimo sugogoda zipata
Yesu ali Mfumu ndi achewo.
Angelo a Mulungu adikira.

4. Zilimba ndi nyimbo zimvekako
Kutama ntchito za Mpulumutsi
Kuchoka ku zodetsa za dzikoli
Atsuka zobvala m'mwazi wa Yesu.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Ku zioni zisoni zitha
M'zioni ndipeza mtendere.

title: Adzabvumba madalitso
otherDetails:
50NEH
19 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
Mighty the Shower of Blessing

verses:
1. Adzabvumba madalitso, agwera pa dzikoli
Tumizani nthawi zanu, zititsitsimutse ife.

2. Adzabvumbatu madalitso okoma !
Mbuye tipempha inu, thirani mzimu wanu.

3. Adzabvumba madalitso, tumizani leroli
Pogwadira nkhope yanu, ife tikumverani.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus : Adzabvumbatu madalitso okoma !
Mbuye tipempha inu Thirani mzimu wanu.

title: Kunabwera usiku uthenga
otherDetails:
27 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
It came upon the Midnight clear

verses:
1. Kunabwera usikuwo, uthenga wakale
Unabwera ndi Angelo anena ndikuti
M'tendere uli pa dziko uchoke kumwamba
Dziko likhala chetetu, amvere Angelo.

2. Kuchokera kumwambako, ndi m'tendere wache
Ndinyimbo zake zimveka ku dziko lotopa
Mu zigwa ndi makhwalala, iwo aimbe
Ndipo mdziko la Babelo, Angelo aimba.

3. Inutu wolemeledwa, ndi akatunduwo
Oyenda-yenda m'dzikomo, ndi zowawa zanu
Nthawi zachisangalalo, ziritu pafupi
Pumanitu pa njirapo, mvere Angelo.

4. Masiku ayandikira, onenedwa kale
Mu kupita kwa zaka, nthawi ya Golide
Pamene m'tendere wache, uphimba dziko
Ndi dziko lonse ti-imba, nyimbo ya Angelo.

title: Aleluya Yesu anditsogolera'ne
otherDetails:
28 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
Halleluya ! Jesus leads me !

verses:
1. Aleluya ! Mbuye Yesu anditsogolera'ne
Mtima wanga khulupira, za chikondi chachecho.

2. Kuthandiza ! khulupira mwa Mulungu
Khulupira mwa Mulungu, wokhulupirika.

3. Aleluya ! Mbuye Yesu andilimbikitsa 'ne,
Andipatsa mkate wache, wa moyo, pomva njala.

4. Aleluya ! Mbuye Yesu, andithangata'ne
Kuthanthwe la kasupeyo, m'mau ache ndimamva.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Solo :- Khulupira, mwa Mulungu
Khulupira athandiza
Khulupira mwa Mulungu wokhulupirika.
Sap :- Khulupira mwa Mulungu
Alto :- Kuthandiza, khulupira
Bass :- Mwa Mulungu, wokhulupirika
Khulupira mwa Mulungu

title: Ndine mphesa
otherDetails:
30 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
I am the Vine

verses:
1. Ndine mphesa, inu ndinu nthambi
Atero Yesu kwa ache lero
Kodi udzakhala mwa iyeyo
Ndikupeza moyo mwa iye.

2. Yesu mphesa, ife ndife nthambi
Wokhala mwa iye adzabala
Iye ali muzu, atipatsa ife
Chakudya cha moyo.

3. Yesu mphesa, ife ndife nthambi
Kodi muwona mphamvu zachezo
Chakudya cholimbitsa chodalitsika
Yesu ali mphesawo.

4. Yesu mphesa, ife ndife nthambi
Ngati sitibala zi patsozo
Tidzafota, kuphya, ndinso kufa
Ndikulowa m'manda.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Khalani nthambi za zipatso
Pa mphesa wa Mbuye
Pomwepo mudzakhala
Ndi ulemelero.

title: Kangadza kangadza
otherDetails:
23 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
Haste away

verses:
1. Kangaza kangaza taona leroli ana ache akunka
Ku zion inde mokondwa akupitabe.
Kangaza kangaza taona leroli tikupita kuli madalitso
Tipita m'ziyoni wa kumwamba.
Korona avala adalitsika
Vutikira mphoto ya choonadi
Tsata Yesu Khristu akutsogoza
Ku ulemelero Khristu akutsogoza
(Ku ulemelero wache kumwamba) *2.

2. Chifundo choona chifundo nchangwiro
Mtumwi wanga ndimkhulupirira
Mokondwa ndimvera mu nkhondozo.
Chifundo choona chifundo mchangwiro
Afuna komwe kuli ochimwa
Ndi wamphamvu satana akadza.
Maso awalatu mokondweretsa
Mu ntchito ya Mbuye ngotenthatentha
Palibe kupuma mpaka atatha
Kuchotsa anthu ku machimo awo.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Ganizo lodala m'mmene tiyendayenda
Sup/alt : Kuimba chimwemwe Yesu anabweretsa
Mwana wa Mulungu namasula undende
(Ndi ganizo ganizo lodala *2). Tenor/bass: Ganizo tiyendayenda
Kuimba anabweretsa
Mwana wamasula ndende
(Ganizo ganizo lodala *2).

title: Momboli wanga wa moyo
otherDetails:
512NEH
33 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
I know that My Redeemer lives

verses:
1. Momboli wanga wa moyo, mau a chitonthozodi
Iye ali wa moyo, ndiye mtsogoleri wanga.

2. Andidalitsa inetu, andipembedzara ine
Adyetsa moyo wangatu, andithandiza m'mabvuto.

3. Andipatsa chuma chache, anditsogolera ine
Anditonthozadi ine, amvera kupempha kwanga.

4. Ulemelero ndi wache, ndi wa moyo wanga
Mau okondweretsadi, Momboli wanga wa moyo.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Momboli wanga wa moyo
Tamandani, ali moyo,

title: Ndidzaimba chitamando chanu
otherDetails:
34 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
I'll sing Thy Praises

verses:
1. Ndidzaimba chitamando chanu
Dzina lanu monga ntchito zanu
Mwalenga moyo watsopano
Mzimu wanu uchita uphungu.

2. Ndidzayamika inu mokondwa
Dzina lanu monga mbiri yanu
Ndidzakhazikitsa mbiri yanu
Mwa chikondi ndi ulemelero.

3. Ndidzayamika ntchito zanuzo
Dzina lanu monga mphamyu zanu
Ndagulidwa mwa chigonjetso
Lero mwandipatsa mtenderewo.

4. Mwa inu ndidzalemekezadi
Dzina lanu monga mphamvu zanu
Mwagonjetsa adani anga
Mwandipatsatu chipulumutso.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Ndiyamika Yesu mwana wankhosa
Woyera wadzala chikondicho.

title: Ulidziwa dziko?
otherDetails:
35 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
Knowest Thou the Land!

verses:
1. Ulidziwa dziko lokondweretsa
Monga maluwa a mu Edeni
Komwe angelo a pumulako
Nthambi za mtendere ziwelama.

2. Ndidzayamika inu mokondwera
Dzina lanu monga mbiri yanu
Ndidzakhazikitsa mbiri yanu
Mwa chikondi ndi ulemelero.

3. Ulidziwa phiri mopita njirayo
Ochepa a yenda mu njirayi
Njokayo ikhalira mu mdima
Koma mbusa atitsogolera.

4. Pempha, uyankhe mafunso awa
Dziko, phiri nyumba ndi njirayo
Penya kwa iye a ku itana
Ndiri njira, ndiri choonadi.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Ulidziwa, ulidziwa uko, uko
Moyo wanga ndikutengerako.

title: M'mene Abusa analonda
otherDetails:
562NEH
37 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
While Shepherds watched

verses:
1. M'mene Abusa analonda, nkhosazo usiku
M'ngelo wa Mbuye anadza
Ndi ulemelero, unawala ponse.

2. Musaope Abusawo, anali ndi mantha
Uthenga wokondweretsa, ndatengera inu
Ndi m'tundu wa anthu.

3. M'mudzi wa David lero, mwabadwatu mwana
M'pulumutsi ndi Ambuye
Ndipotu ichichi, ndi chizindikiro.

4. Mwanayo muzam'peza, mwana wa kumwamba
Mukholamo la ziweto
Wagona modyera, mkhola la ziweto.

5. Ulemelero kumwamba, ugwere padziko
M'tendere kwa anthu onse
Usadzachokenso, usadzachokenso.

title: Munthuwe, khululukira
otherDetails:
38 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
O man take Counsel and Forgive

verses:
1. Munthuwe, khululukira
Chotsa mangawa muyanjanenso
Chikondi chifundo zikhale
Chotsa mkwiyo wa mtima wako
Pali nthawi lero usazengereze
Usabvutitse m'bale kapena m'longo
Khulukira.

2. Munthuwe, khululukira
Chotsa mangawa muyanjanenso
Sudziwa konse za mawalo
Kukondwa m'dziko ndi chisoni
Ngati mangawa ako akudzera
Kumbukira kuti lero lidzapita
Khulukira.

3. Munthuwe, khululukira
Chotsa mangawa muyanjanenso
Mwa Mbuye adzaitana
Udzaima pa mpando wache
Udzaima bwanji pamaso pache
Iye wakuchotsera mangawa ako
Khulukira

title: Ndidzaimba za Momboli
otherDetails:
91NEH
41 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
91 NEH
I will sing of My Redeemer

verses:
1. Ndidzaimba za momboli, ndidzachikondi chache
Pa mtanda anandifera, kundiombola Ine

2. Ndidzaimba za nthanoyo, yopulumutsa ine
Mwa chikondi ndi chifundo, anandifera ine

3. Ndiyamika Momboliyo, 'dzanena mphamvu yache
Ananena kulalika, ku machimo ndi Imfa

4. Ndidzaimba za Momboli, ndichikondi cha m'mwamba
Anandichotsa ku Imfa, ine mwana wa mlungu
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus : Ndidzaimba za Momboli, ndimwazi nandigula
Pa mtanda analipira, kundimasula ine

title: Ndiri wanutu Mbuye
otherDetails:
84NEH
48 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
I am Thine, O Lord

verses:
1. Ndiri wanutu ndamva mauwo achikhululukiro
Ndifunitsitsa mumtima wanga kukhala m'fupi ndi Inu.

2. Mundiyeretse ine ndi Mzimu wanu ku ntchito yanu
Zofuna zanga ndipatsa inu kuti ndidzapindule.

3. Ndikondweretu ndi mtima wariga ku chifuniro chanu
Ndidzipereka ine kwa Inu ndikhale wa inutu.

4. Pali kuya kwa chikondi chanu chosadziwika konse
Pali kuya kwa chisangalalo kuti tione inu.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: M'ndisendeze Yesu Mbuye wanganu
Potuluka mwaziwo
M'ndisendeze Yesu Mbuye wanganu
Ndikhaletu ndi inu.

title: Mundikonze a Mbuye
otherDetails:
49 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
O fashion me, my Master

verses:
1. Mundikonze a Mbuye, mwa kufuna kwanu
Mlamuli wa mizimu, mukhalebe ndine
Mlamuli wa mizimu, mukhalebe ndine,

2. Mundizingilire'ne ndi chikondi chanu
Chotsani zoyipazo, m'cho-onadi chanu
Chotsani zoyipazo, m'cho-onadi chanu.

3. Sindidzaleka ai, kutsata njirayo
Khalani mfupi ndine, ku nthawi yosatha
Khalani mfupi ndine, ku nthawi yosatha.

title: Aleluya ! wa ukadi
otherDetails:
511NEH
62 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Hallelujah Resurrected

verses:
1. Aleluya ! wa ukadi, Mbuye wa mphamvu yonse,
Mandawo ang'ambikadi, imfa ya gonjetsedwa,
Wa ukadi Yesu wanga, dziko lim yamikedi,
Waukadi Yesu wanga, dziko lim'yamikedi.

2. Aleluya ! wa ukadi, wokhulupirikayo,
Wotumiza Mzimu wache, kutitsogolera'fe
Waukadi Yesu wanga, sindidzaopa konse,
Waukadi Yesu wanga, sindidzaopa konse.

3. Aleluya ! wa ukadi, m'tame mphamyu yacheyo,
Atsogoza okondedwa, kutuluka mu imfa,
Waukadi Mbuye wanga, tiyamikire iye
Waukadi Mbuye wanga, tiyamikire iye.

title: Yesu ali ndi moyo
otherDetails:
64 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Jesus Lives !

verses:
1. Yesu ali ndi moyo
Imfayo ilibe mphamvu
Yesu ali ndi moyo
Adzandichotsa m'mandamo
Zabwino zidzayamba
Chitsimikizo changa.

2. Yesu ali ndi moyo
Akuweruza m'mwambamo
Ndidzapita komweko
Kukaweruza ndi iye
Sindikaika konse
Chitsimikizo changa.

3. Yesu ali ndi moyo
Andipatsa chikondicho
Umoyo pena imfa
Sizidzandichotsa kwache
Andichinjirizadi
Chitsimikizo changa.

4. Yesu ali ndi moyo
Ndiye khomo la moyo
Sindidzanjenjemera
Pomwe ndilowa pa khomo
Chikhulupiriro
Chitsimikizo changa.

title: M'mawa tidzafesa
otherDetails:
124NEH
91 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Sowing in the Morning

verses:
1. M,mawa tidzafesa, mbeu zakukoma
M'sana ndi usiku, tidzafensanso
Nyengo ya masika, tidzatema munda
Tidzabwera tonse, ndizipatsozo

2. Tidzafesa m'dzuwa, tidzafesa mthunzi
Sitiopa thambo ndi chisanucho
Atatha masika ntchitozo zizatha
Tidzabwera tonse ndidzipatsozo

3. Tiri kulirabe, tidzafesa mbeu
Ngakhale tigwidwa, ndizisonizo
Kulira kudzatha, adzatilandira
Tidzabwera tonse ndidzipatsozo
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Ndidzipatsozo, ndidzipatsozo
Tidzabwera tonse, ndidzipatsozo
Ndidzipatsozo, ndidzipatsozo
Tidzabwera tonse, ndidzipatsozo

title: M'mene masiku akupita
otherDetails:
92 OLD HYMNAL FRONT (341NAH)
While the Days are going by

verses:
1. Kuli anthu otaika, popitatu masiku
Ofuna chisangalatso, popitatu masiku
Pobwezera chimwemwe, poyenda pa ulendo
Zabwino tingachite, popitatu masiku.

2. Nthawi yonyoza palibe, popitatu masiku
Nkhope 'khale monga m'mawa popitatu masiku
Dziko liusa moyo, kulira ndi chisoni
Thandiza wakugwato, popitatu masiku.

3. Chikondi chotimangatu, popitatu masiku
M'modzi m'modzi atsatira, popitatu masiku
Zofetsa zidzakula, mu dzuwa ndi munthuzi
Zidzatisangalatsa, popitatu masiku.

title: Musagonjeretu ku mayesero
otherDetails:
168NEH
98 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Yield not to Temptation

verses:
1. Musagonjeretu kumayesero
Mudzathandizidwa, mudzapambana
Menyani nkhondoyo, mudzagonjetsa
Penya kwa Yesu, adzakutenga.

2. Musalole oyankhula zoipa
Woopa dzina lache, Mulungu wathu
Khalatu wo-ona ndi wachifundo
Penya kwa Yesu, adzakutenga.

3. Adzakupatsani korona wache
Mwachisomo chache, tidzapambana
Ndiye Mpulumutsi, ndimphamvu yathu
Penya kwa Yesu, adzakutenga.

title: Ndinapatsa moyo wanga
otherDetails:
493NEH
115 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
I gave my Life for Thee

verses:
1. Ndi napatsa moyo, mwaziwo unathirika
Kuti upulumutsidwe kuchoka ku Imfa
Ndi napatsa moyo wanga, unandipatsanji?
Ndi napatsa moyo wanga, unandipatsanji?

2. Nyumba yakuwala ndi mpando ndinasiya
Ndinadza padziko kwa anthu osochera
Ndinasiya kamba kako, iwe wasiyanji?
Ndinasiya kamba kako, iwe wasiyanji?

3. Ndinabvutikadi kosafotokozeka
Mu zowawa zonse, kuti upulumuke
Ndatenga zowawa zako, iwe watenganji?
Ndatenga zowawa zako, iwe watenganji?

4. Ndakutengera iwe kuchoka kumwamba
Chipulumutso chako ndi chikhululukiro
Ndakutengera mphatsozo, wanditengeranji?
Ndakutengera mphatsozo, wanditengeranji?

title: Limbikirani Yesu
otherDetails:
152NEH
150 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Stand up for Jesus

verses:
1. Limbikirani Yesu, ankhondo a mtanda
Mbendera nyamulani, musatenthemere
Mukupambana konse, Mtsogozi wankhondo
Adzagonjetsa onse, Khristu ndi Mfumudi.

2. Limbikirani Yesu, mkhale mphamvu zache
Mphamvu za thupi taya, zikulepherani
Mtenge ulalikiri mpempherere zonse
Muntchito ndimoopsya, musaope kanthu,

3. Limbikirani Yesu, bvuto lonse litha
Lero mumenya nkhondo, mawa m'dzapambana
Kwa 'mene dzapambana, apatsidwa korona
Adzalamula naye, Mfumu kwa muyaya.

title: Dzani ku phwandolo
otherDetails:
277NEH
153 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Come, for the Feast is Spread

verses:
1. Dzani ku phwandolo, lakonzedwa,
Ku Mkate wa moyo, wa nonsenu
Dzani, Zache ndi zanunzo.
Muchisomo mudzalandira

2. Dzani ku kasupe, wa umoyo
Achiza zowawa, chikayiko
Ambiri achira kwaulere
Dzani ku zokoma, idzanitu.

3. Dzani ku mpandowo, wa chisomo
Woposa liwiro, a pumako
Zifuniro zawo, apeza chisomo
Afunitsa Yesu, MKhristu bwera.

4. Dzani ku dzikolo, aulendo
Dziko lapansili, lachilendo
Za chisangalalo, aimba azeze
Bvalani korona, alendonu.

5. Yesu tidza kwanu, mtilowetse
Mutimasuledi, m'tiwalitse
Mudziko lowala, abvala zoyera
Mosatopa konse, tidzaimba.

title: Ndikupemphelera
otherDetails:
278NEH
168 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
For you I am Praying

verses:
1. Mpulumutsiyo mu ulemelero
Wachikondi sindifuna abwenzi
Mwa chifundo andiyang'anira ine
Iye akhale Mpulumutsi wako.

2. Atate wanga andipatsa ine
Chiyembekezo chache chamuyaya
Ndipo adzandi-itana kumwambako
A-itana iwe pamodzi ndine.

3. Ndiri ndi chobvaladi choyerambe
Chindidikira mu ulemelero
Ndipo pamene ndilandira chobvala
Bwenzi iwenso ukalandireko.

4. Ukapeza Yesu uzanso enawo
Mpulumutsi wanga alinso wako
Pemphera akhale mu ulemelero
Iye adzayankha kamba ka iwe.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Ndikupemphelera, ndikupemphelera
Ndikupemphelera, ndikupemphelera.

title: Yesu mofatsa aitana tonse
otherDetails:
300NEH
178 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Softly and Tenderly

verses:
1. Yesu mofatsa aitana tonse, mvanitu mau ache
Akugogoda pa nkhomo la mtima, mtima wako ndi wanga.

2. Uchedweranji Yesu mpembedza, kwa iwe ndi kwa ine
Uchedweranji pafundo zache, za iwe ndi za ine.

3. Nthawi ifulumila kupita, kwa iwe ndi kwa ine
Mdima wa imfa ukudza msanga, kwa iwe ndi ine.

4. Yesu alonjeza chikondi chache, cha iwe ndi cha ine
Nkana tachimwa akhululuka, tchimo lako ndi langa.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Dzani dzani, wotopanu idzani
Mwa chikondi Yesu aitana, wochimwawe bwera.

title: Ubwino wa dziko uli wosakhalitsa
otherDetails:
480NEH
184 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Earthly pleasures are but Fleeting

verses:
1. Ubwino wa Dziko uli wosakhalitsa
Chisangalalo chibwera m'mau a Yesu.

2. Mumabvuto ndi zowawa, chaka chapita
Talimbana ndi mdaniyo, m'chisomo chache.

3. Mumdima tilowadi chaka chatsopano
Mwa chikhulupilirocho, ali pafupi.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Tonse mokondwera, ndi Mtima umodzitu
Chaka ichi chapita, timenye nkhondo
Mtsogolo. E, chaka ichi chapitatu
Timenye nkhondo mtsogolo.

title: Mulungu akhale ndi inu
otherDetails:
586NEH
196 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
God be with you

verses:
1. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, atsogodze asunge'nu
Monga nkhosa za pabusa, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

2. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, m'mapiko akubiseni
Tsiku lonse akudyetseni, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

3. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, ndi pamene muvutika
Adzakuthandizani'nu, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

4. Mulungu akhale ndi inu, ndi chikondi chache chonse
Asunge m'zoopsya zonse, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Tidzakumanabe, pamapazi a Yesu
Tidzakumanabe, Mulungu akhale ndi inu.

title: Mu msipu wabwinowo
otherDetails:
379NEH
209 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Into Pastures Green and Fair

verses:
1. Mu msipu wabwinowo, Mbusa atitsogolera
Atipatsa ife madzi amoyo
Mu madalitso ache, tipezamo mtendere.
Nako kuwala kwa cholinga chathu

2. Tikonda kukhalako, kuchoka kuzadziko
Ndim'mapemphero athu kwa iye
Timvere Mbuye wathu, atisendeza mfupi
Ponena iye mau a chikondi.

3. Iye atikondadi, afuna kutibusa
Monga nkhosa yosochera kutali
Abale tiyenitu, timutsatire iye
Adzatitsogolera m'njira zathu.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: M'tsinje wa moyo wosatha, Msipu wodalitsika
Mau a Ambuye Yesu, Ali ochiritsatu
Kwa onse odzipereka kwa iye.

title: Ndinamva mau a Yesu
otherDetails:
374NEH
210 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
I heard the voice of Jesus say

verses:
Ndinamva mau a Yesu, idza nupumule
Tula katundu wakoyo, pa chifuwa changa.

2. Ndinadza kwa Yesu Mbuye, wotopa, wolema
Ndapeza mpumulo wanga, wandisangalatsa.

3. Ndinamva mau Yesu, mwa ulere ndithu
Madzi amoyo andipatsa, bwera wa ludzuwe.

4. Ndinadza kwa Yesu kumwa, m'kasupe wa moyo
Ludzu langa linathadi, ndinakhala mwa iye.

5. Ndinamva mau a Yesu, 'ndine kuunika'
Iwe yang'ana kwa ine, udzawala ndithu.

6. Ndinayang'ana kwa Yesu, dzuwa ndi nyenyezi
Ndidzayenda mkuunika, muulumelero wanga.

title: Tenga dzina-lo la Yesu
otherDetails:
218 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
The Precious name

verses:
1. Tenga dzinalo la Yesu, mwana osaukawe
Ndilo lothandiza iwe, konse konse upita.

2. Tenga dzinalo la Yesu, monga chikopa chako
Mu mayeso ako onse, tchula dzina lachelo.

3. Dzina la Yesu lokoma, litisangalatsa ife
Mmene adzatilandira, tidzakondwelerako.

4. Tigwadira dzina lache, pa mapazi achewo
Mfumu yamafumu onse, tidzabvala korona.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Dzinalo, labwino, chiyembezo chathu
Dzinalo labwino, chiyembezo chathu.

title: Lizani mabelu a kumwambako
otherDetails:
230 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Ring the Bells of Heaven

verses:
1. Lizani mabelu a kumwambako
Wosocherayo wabweratu
Ona Atate akumana naye
Mwana wache wosochera.

2. Lizani mabelu a kumwambako
Wosochera wamasulidwa
Inde waomboledwa ku machimo
Wabadwa monga watsopano.

3. Lizani mabelu a kumwambako
Phwando lache lakonzekadi
Tumizani uthenga kutaliko
Moyo wabadwa kachiwiri.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Angelowo aimbitsadi
Ulemelero kwa Mulungu
Owomboledwawo monga ankhondo
Aimba nyimbo ya ufulu.

title: Mukhale ndine
otherDetails:
232NEH
235 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Abide with Me

verses:
1. Mukhale ndine dzuwa lalowa
Wagwa usiku bwenzi lisowa
Ndilibe wina wondithandiza
Wa mphamvu ndinu mukhale ndinetu.

2. Ka moyo kanga katha leroli
Zidzachokanso zinthu za dziko
Zimasinthika zo-onekazo
Simusinthika m'khale ndinetu.

3. Nthawitu ya kupemphera
Ndikhale mchifundo chanu
Mukatsogola sindiopai
Msana usiku mkhale ndinetu.

4. Ndionetseni mtanda wanuwo
Muunikire ine kumwamba
Mdima uthawa m'mawa wafika
M'moyo mu imfa m'khale ndinetu.

title: Kugonjetsa adzagonjetsa
otherDetails:
222NEH
262 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Victory through Grace.

verses:
1. Kugonjetsa adzagonjetsa, Mfumu ili mu mphamvu
Atsogoza okhulupirira, pakati pa nkhondoyo
Akupita patsogolo, Oobvala zoyera mbeen
Mvani kuitana dzina, la mtsogoleri wao.

2. Kugonjetsa adzagonjetsa, kodi ndani Mfumuyo
Atsogolera a nkhondowo, mu ulemelerowo
Ali Ambuye momboli, mpulumutsi ndi Mfumu
Nyenyezi zache zowala, mu Ufumu wachewo.

3. Kugonjetsa adzagonjetsa, Yesu Mfumu ya tonse
Mipando-ndodo, a korona, zaziko zonse zitha
Ankhondo muwatsogoza, akhala owonadi
Muwapeza mnyumba zanu, apuma ku nkhondo
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Sikwa a mphamvu munkhondo, Sikwa othamanga
Koma okhulupirika, 'dzapambana mchisomo.

title: Haya ! anzanga taonani
otherDetails:
184NEH
265 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Hold the Fort

verses:
1. Haya ! anzanga taonani, chenjezo
Magulu ayandikira, kudzapambana.

2. Ankhondowo asatana, akupitabe
Amphamvuwo ali kugwa, ali ndi mantha.

3. Mvani lipenga, mbendera.yakwezekatu
Mwa mtsogoleri wathuyo, tidzagonjetsa.

4. Nkhondo yalimba, thandizo liri pafupi
Wolamulira wafika, kondweranitu.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Yesu atichenjezatu, limbikanibe
Mwa chisomo tidzachita,
.Yankhani m'mwamba.

title: Molimbika mtima tidzayendabe
otherDetails:
219NEH
274 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Tolling Bravely onward

verses:
1. Molimbika mtima tidzayendabe
M'chikondi cha Yesu, tsiku ndi tsiku
Sitiponya nkhondo kukondweretsa
Zofuna za anthu, koma za Khristu.

2. Molimbika mtima tidzayendabe
Anthuwo aseke monga kwa Nowa
Mdani akalipe mantha palibe
Khristu watichotsa uchimo wathu.

3. Molimbika mtima tidzayendabe
Aneneri ache anabvutika
Mu ntchito za Yesu monga Ambuye
Atsogoleradi, ana achewo.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Ngakhale mdaniyo, pena namondwe
Mwa Atumwi ache, tidzayendabe.

title: Mtima wanga
otherDetails:
244NEH
276 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Here is My Heart.

verses:
1. Mtima wanga, Mlungu ndipereka, Inu woupanga
Mwana wanga ukane za dziko, imva mau ache
Mchisomo mphatso yapatsidwa, tengani Mlungu mudalitse
Ndipereka mtima wanga.

2. Mtima wangau, walandiratu uli wofokatu
Ndipereka mokhulupirika, mosanyozeratu
Ndizoipa waonetsedwa, wodzazidwa ndiuchimo
Mtima wanga woipatu.

3. Mtima wanga ukhale wamphamvu, udza ku mtandako
Ndanitu chuma chamoyo mu imfa yanuyo
Mumabala a Khristu Mbuye, ndipeza madalitso
Mtima wokhulupirika.

title: Mzimu ndi mtsogoleri
otherDetails:
468NEH
288 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Holy Spirit Faithful Guide

verses:
1. Mzimu ndi m'tsogoleri, m'njira ya chi-Khristuyo
M'titsogoze ifetu, pa-ulendo wathuwo
Wotopa akondwere, pomva mau achewo
Pakunena Mzimuyo, wosochera bweratu.

2. Pafupi ndi bwezilo, m'chithandizo chanucho
Si-tidera nkhawazo, poyenda mu m'dimawo
Pakuomba mphepozo, pakufoka mtimatu
Pakunena Mzimuyo, wosochera bweratu.

3. M'mene bvuto lidzatu, poyembekezeratu,
M'mapemphero athuwo, ngati talembedwamo
Mumadzi osefukawo, mu mwazi wa Yesuyo
Pakunena Mzimuyo, wosochera bweratu.

title: Yesu mundiyendetse
otherDetails:
196NEH
292 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Jesus Saviour Pilot Me

verses:
1. Yesu mundiyendetse, pa nyanja ya namondwe
Mafunde akauka, mu mathanthwe anyanja
Khalani maso anga, Yesu mundiyendetse.

2. Monga mwana kwa mache, tonthozani nyanjayo
Nyanja zikumverani, m'mene munena chete
Woweruza wa nyanja, Yesu mundiyendetse.

3. Pofika kutsidyalo, ndimkokomo wa nyanja
Pafupi ndi mtendere, pa chifukwa chanucho
Ndimva kundi-itana, 'ndidzakuyendetsani'.

title: Mulungu anditsogoza
otherDetails:
247NEH
296 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Just as God leads Me

verses:
1. Mulungu anditsogoza, sindisankha njira yanga
Ndikhutira zopatsidwa, sandisocheretsa ine
Ndiyenda mokondweradi, mmene atsogoza mnjira
Mongatu mwana wache.

2. Mulungu anditsogoza, ndipumula mdzanja lache
Muchimene anatuma, mwa kulamulira kwache
Ndifuna kukwaniritsa, mukumalizitsa kwache
Mu moyo pena imfa.

3. Mulungu anditsogoza, ndikhulupira iye
Mkuunika kwa chinyengocho, ndiyenda mu uphungu wache
Chikondi cha chilungamo, pondi-ika m'ku-unika
Ndigonjera kwa iye.

4. Mulungu anditsogoza, mu chiyembekezerocho
Ndipatsidwa mphamvu zache, sindisintha chiri chonse
Tero ndakhazikikadi, ndi ika moyo mwa iye
Wondipatsa chifundo.

title: M'nditsogoze m'ku-unika
otherDetails:
297 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Lead Kindly Light

verses:
1. M'nditsogoze m'ku-unika kwanu
M'dimawo wafika, ndiri kutari ndi kwathu
Munditsogolere, sungani mapazi anga
Pa ulendo wanga wa ku-mudzi.

2. Sindinakupemphani nthawi zonse
Kunditsogolera, ndinakonda njira zanga
Ndinakonda tsiku labwino, m'nthawi ya nthawi
Musakumbuke zanga zakale.

3. Mphamvu yanu yadalitsa ine,
Ndidzatsogoleredwa m' madambo ndi m'mapiri
Usikuwo wafika ndi m'mawa wafikadi
Umene ndinafuna kuona.

title: Yesu bwenzi langadi
otherDetails:
195NEH
304 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Jesus Lover of My Soul

verses:
1. Yesu bwenzi langadi, ndithawira kwathu,
Pokwera madzi anyanja, pouka chimphepocho.

2. Kothawira ndiribe, chithandizo changanu
Musandisiye ndekha, munditonthoze ine.

3. Chikhulupiliro changa, chithandizo ndinu
Muphimbe mutu wanga, ndi mapiko anuwo.

4. Chisomocho chambiri, chiphimba tchimo
Mumtsinje wochiritsa, ndiyeretseni ine

5. Ndinu mtsinje wa moyo, ndimwe mu kasupe
Dzutsani moyo wanga, ukwere ku muyaya.

6. Ndibisale mwa inu, namondweyo apita
Mnditsogoze kumwamba, mndilandire kwanu.

title: Dzuwa langa
otherDetails:
304 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Sun of My Soul

verses:
1. Dzuwa langa M'pulumutsi, sikungade, mfupi ndi Inu
Mitamboyo singadzetu, kubisa nkhope yanuyo.

2. M'mene madontho amame, agwetsa zikope zanga
Ganizo la kupumula, pa chifuwa cha Mbuye.

3. Mkhale nane dzuwa lonse, popanda Inu ndidzafa
Mukhale nane usiku, kuti ndikhale ndi moyo.

4. Mundidalitse pouka, kuti ndiyende m'dzikomo
Ndikhale m'chikondi chanu, ndipenye za kumwambako.

title: Chikhulupiriro chathu
otherDetails:
207NEH
267 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Safely faith through life

verses:
1. Chikhulupiriro chathu, chili mudzanja lache
Chithandiza, chilimbitsa, mumphamvu ya chikondi
Chithandiza, chilimbitsa, mumphamvu ya chikondi.

2. Chikondi sichifoketsa, zo-oneka mwa ena
Chifundo cha Mpulumutsi, chiphimbadi zolakwa
Chifundo cha Mpulumutsi, chiphimbadi zolakwa.

3. Chiyembekezero chathu, popenya za mtsogolo
Chitonthoza mu zowawa, kufikira zidzatha
Chitonthoza mu zowawa, kufikira zidzatha.

4. Mwa chiphunzitso cha Yesu, momwemonso tikhale
Mu ntchito ndi chikhalidwe, ulemu kwa Mulungu
Mu ntchito ndi makhalidwe, ulemu kwa Mulungu.

title: Muzisoni ndapeza chikondwerero
otherDetails:
192NEH
58 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
I've Found a Joy in Sorrow

verses:
1. Muzisoni ndapeza chikondwerero
Tsiku lina labwino ndi dzuwa lawala
Malo ochiritsawo, Mfumu ndi kasupe
Mbuye atonthozadi, moyo woswekawo
Mbuye atonthozadi, moyo woswekawo.

2. Mumatsoka ndapeza chisangalalocho
Ndapeza manna, koma mphesa sizibala
Ndapeza thanthwe, kasupe mchipululu
Ndapeza m'pumulowo, nditabvutikadi
Ndapeza m'pumulowo, nditabvutikadi.

3. Malo otsitsimutsa, ndi akasupewo
M'dalitso okwanira, mulonjezanolo
Pambuyo pa misozi, ndaona dzuwalo
Lindikwaniritsadi, lichotsa zowawa
Lindikwaniritsadi, lichotsa zowawa.

4. Mwampulumutsi wanga, ndisangalaladi,
Ndipeza machiritso ndi madalitsowo,
Lonjezano la iwo, woopa Mulungu
Ndiwo ulemerero, wompatsa M'tima
Ndi ulemerero wompatsa M'tima.

title: Ndipenya kwa inu
otherDetails:
495NEH
49 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
My Faith looks up to Thee

verses:
1. Ndipenya kwa inu mwana wa nkhosanu
M'pulumutsi, ndimvereni ine
Mundichotseretu, machimo angawo, ndiyere mbee.

2. Mundipatsa mphamvu, ku m'tima wofoka
Ndilimbetu, munandiferatu
Chikondi chanucho, chisasinthe konse, monga moto,

3. Poyenda mum'dima, ndi zisoni zanga
M'nditsogoze, chotsani m'dimawo
Bvuto ndi misozi, ndisasocheretu, kusiya'nu.

4. Pakutha kwa moyo, pakudza imfayo
Kundizinga M'pulumutsi wanga
Chotsani manthawo, nditengeni ine, kumwambako.

title: Usikuwo pa phirilo
otherDetails:
54 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
'Tis midnight

verses:
1. Usikuwo paphirilo, nyenyezi zasiyatu
Uli usiku m'mundamo, Mbuye apemphera yekha.

2. Usikuwo, zonse zatha, Mbuye avutika yekha
Iye anamkondayo, sasamala mabvutowo.

3. Usikuwo, m'chimo lathu, Mbuye alira m'mwaziwo
Amene abvutikadi, sadzachotsedwa kwa iye.

4. Usikuwo bvuto latha, liumbika ndi Angelo
Yosadziwika ndi anthu, nyimboyo yotonthoza Mbuyeyo.

title: Kutali ndi mizinda ya Anthu
otherDetails:
58 OLD HYMNAL BACK/ADDENDA
Wandering a far

verses:
1. Kutali ndi mizinda ya anthu, mvani kufu-ula kwa a khate
Yesu mutichitire chifundo, mutichiritse matenda athu.

2. M'modziyo atayamika Mbuye, anachiritsidwa mumauwo
Kutama m'chiritsi wamkuluyo, komabe enawo ali kuti?

3. Afarisi afunsa za Yesu, ndiwe Khristu kodi? Utiuze
Unyinjiwo wotsatira iye, komatu enanso, ali kuti?
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Anthu khumi anachira
Nanga enawo, ali kuti?

title: Yamikani inu Ambuye
otherDetails:
62NEH
Thank Ye the Lord

verses:
1. Yamikani inu Ambuye
Pakuti inu muli ndi chikondi chosatha
Chiri cha muyaya, chiri cha muyaya.

2. Tamandani inu Ambuye
Moyo wanga kumbuka zimene wakuchitira
Wakuchitiradi, wakuchitiradi.

3. Wamphamvuyo, Mulungu wathu
Ntchito zache za nzeru, Apatsa chisomo chache
Chiri cha tsopano, chiri cha tsopano.

4. Wamkuluyo, Mulungu wathu
Dziko lonse lidzakhala ndi ulemelero wache
Ulemelerowo, ulemelerowo.

5. Imbiradi ! Ambuye wathu
Iye akumva nyimbo zathu, za chisangalalo
Amvera nyimbozo, amvera nyimbozo.

title: Chaka ichi chikutha
otherDetails:
483NEH
The year so still is Ending

verses:
1. Chaka ichi chikutha Mtima wanga fatsa
Kwa Mlungu Tate wathu tipereke zonse
Zamchaka ichi zonse Mlungu akudziwa
Mabala athu onse ndi misonzi yathu.

2. Chisoni nchachikulu chimwemwe nchochepa
Msanga tinalekana ndi okondedwawo
Maso milomo yawo, imfa inatseka, sangalaladi
Lakhulanso zowawazi mchotse

3. Kuti tisayiwale timayiwalazo
Kuti dziko lapansi simudziwa wathuwu,
Mbuye ali ndi ache omwe abadwanso anagulira iwo
Mzinda wazioni.

4. Mdzikoli tilekana m'misonzi mzowawa
Kutsidya tidzakondwa kwa nthawi zosatha
Tipatseni mtendere tithe kuonanso
Yendani nafe Mbuye kunka kumwambako.

title: Mu Chisokonezo Cha Anthu Onse
otherDetails:
53 NAH
Mid Scenes of Confusion

verses:
1. Mu chisokonezo cha anthu onse,
Moyo wanga ukondwera ndi oyera
Pa phwandolo pali malo angadi
Ndikhazikika mwa Yesu Mbuyeyo

2. Umodzi wa anawo a mtendere
Mchikondi chache chosalekadi
Ngakhale ndiyenda muzisonizo
Ndifunitsa kupenya nkhope yanu

3. Ndifuna kumasuka mu uchimo
Undiletsa chikondwelero changa
Mayeso anga ndiukiradi
Ndidzakhala mtendere ndi Inu

4. Ndikhala muchigwa cha mabvuto
Ndipatseni mphamvuzo nthawi zonse
Ndibwera kwa Inu m'mabvuto anga
Kuyembekezera mudzi wanga

5. Ndipatseni ine chisomo chanu
Mzimu undisangalalitse
Ndipatseni chifaso kudikira
Kuyembekezera mudzi wangawo

6. Ndifunitsitsa nkhope yanuyo
Monga ndiri mu dziko la zisoni
Mu chifanizo chanu ndiukedi
Ndi zikwizo kunka kumudzi kwathu
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus; Kwathu, kwathu, mudzi wanga
Ndikonzeni ndikafike kumudzi

title: Yamikani Ambuye wathu
otherDetails:
58NEH
Praise Thou the Lord

verses:
1. Yamikani Ambuye wathu, Mfumu yathudi
Imba nyimbo moyo wanga. ndi akumwambako
Idzanitu, ndi zilimba ndi zeze, muimbireni Mulengi wathu.

2. Yamikani muweruzi ndi mtsogoleri
Akuyendetsa m'zinjira, atumiza, zifundo, madalitso
Mtima wako uyamike.

3. Yamikani wachisomoyo, wodabwitsayo
Akunyamula, ukagwa akudzutsa iwe
Wofokatu, osatha kulankhula, udzaphimbika mwa iye.

4. Yamikani Mbuye mtsogoleri wa moyo wako
Mwa mwana wache wakupatsa iwe chisomo
Ganizatu, Mulungu wamphamvu, sachoka kwa mwana wache.

5. Yamikani Ambuye wa chifundo chosatha
Osankhidwanu, imbani nyimbo mukondwere
Imbanitu, moyo wanga yamika, m'yamikeni nthawi zonse.

title: Kuli kasupe
otherDetails:
336NEH
There is a fountain

verses:
1. Kuli kasupe wa mwazi kwa onse ochimwa
Kasupe wodabwitsa wochotsa zisoni

2. Mwazi wa mwana wa nkhosa undiyembekeza
Tsanulani mzimu wanu mlenge zatsopano.

3. Pamene ndiri m'machimo ndifuna mwaziwo
Ndidzaimba ndi chimwemwe za chisomo chake.

4. Mwazi ukhale kasupe wotha ludzu langa
Udzakhala nyimbo yanga pachifuwa chake.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Ndipenya mwazi wangwiro
M'chikhulupiriro machimo atha
Mdziweli ndi imfa ya Yesu.

title: Thanthwe long'ambikatu
otherDetails:
498NEH
Rock of Ages Cleft for Me

verses:
1. Thanthwe long'ambikatu, ndibisale momwemo.
Madzi ndipo Mwaziwo, zoturuka m'nthitimo
Zinditsuke mtima mbu, zindilimbikitsetu.

2. Ntchito zanga zonsezo, sizikondweretsanu
Ndikazigwiritsadi, ndikalira nsonizi
Zonse sizikwanai, koma Yesu yekhayo

3. M'manja mwanga chabebi, mtanda ndingogwiradi
Ndiyang'ana kwa inu, ku chisomo chanucho
Ndithawire mtsinjewo, munditsuke m'mtimamo.

4, Moyo wanga kunsiku, pena ndimwaliratu
M'mene ndidzaukanso, tionane masowo
Thanthwe long ambikatu, ndibisale momwemo.

title: Haleluya kwaya zonse ziimba
otherDetails:
97 NAH
Hallelujah! Choirs are singing

verses:
1. Haleluya kwaya zonse ziimba kuyamika Yesu
Khristu, tsikuli nlalikuludi, Mbuye waturuka m'ndende
Kuimfa ndi manda wauka , anadza kutiwombola
Mphamvu zonse nzake wagonjetsa zonse haleluya
Watsiriza ntchito yake pogonjetsa imfa ndithu.

2. Tinatengedwa ku fumbi ndipo tidzaukitsidwadi
M'nalenga fumbi ndi moyo, Iye wapereka mphamvu
Ndi ulemelero kwa onse, ofuna moyo wosatha
Mbuye tili anu wodala kwa myaya haleluya
Sitiopa mfupi ndinu Yesu Khristu waukadi

3. Tsiku lotamanda Mbuye akwaniritsa pempho lathu
Ndikuunikira manda. Ife ndife okondwera
Kuti mdima tsono uchoka, tidzavala zoyera mbee
Mbuye m'titsogoze tilambira inu ana anu
Munadutsa imfa zedi kutipezetsa mpumulo.

title: Kodi mumwazika bwanji?
otherDetails:
101 NAH
Souls of Man, Why will Ye Scatter?

verses:
1. Kodi mu mwazika bwanji, monga nkhosa
Bwanji mungoyenda yenda, kuchoka
Kodi kuli Mbusa wina, wofatsa wa chikondi
Ndani kwa Mpulumutsiyo, pamapazi achewo,

2. Mulungu wa chikondiyo, wa chikondi koposa
Ndiye Atate, chikondi chache chopitilira
Chifundo chache chakula monga kukula kwache
Muli chifundo chache, chopambana ufumu.

3. Kumwamba mabvuto athu adzadziwika koposa
Kumwamba kulakwa kwathu, kulandira chifundo
Ochimwa alandilidwa, alandira chisomo
Mpulumutsi wa chifundo, atichilitsa ife.

4. Tisachepetse chikondi chopatsidwa ndi Mbuye
Tikulitsadi ulemu, wopatsidwa kwa iye
Muli chiombolo chache, pomwaza mwazi wache
Muli chisangalaro chathu muzowawa za Mbuye.

5. Ngatitu tikonda lye, tisunge mau ache
Moyo wathu udzawala, mu-ubwino wa Mbuye
Chikondi cha Mulunguyo, chili chotambalala
Ndipo mtima wa Mulungu uli wodabwitsadi.

title: Ntchito ndi yanu Mulungu
otherDetails:
159NEH
The work is Thine My Lord and God

verses:
1. Ntchito ndi yanu Mulungu, momwe tikondwera
Popeza ntchito ndi yanu, siidzaonongeka
Isanamere mbeuyo, munthaka imayambatu
Yabwelera mchikhalidwe, chake chapoyambacho
Imayamba yadutsa mu imfa.

2. Mbuye mnasautsidwadi, mnayang'ana mmwamba
Mtenge ali mu umodzi, kunka mparadiso
Mbuye dzani mdzatitenge, matsautso tigonjetsa
Kudzera mu imfa yanu, pogwiranso ntchito yanu
Ife tipata moyo osatha

3. Mbuye Yesu mnatifera, mnagonjetsa imfa
Mdzadyetsa mizimu yonse, ya otumikira
Tumizani amithenga, alalike dzina lanu
Matamando kwa Mbuyenu, tidzagwira ntchito yanu
Tidzadikira kudzanso kwanu

title: N'nali pachipata
otherDetails:
321NEH
I stood at mercy's gate

verses:
1. N'nali pachipata monga wosochera
Ndinagwida mantha kupempha chifundo
Ndi moyo wa mantha kunali kuchedwa
Kuthera panjira (ndinapempheratu *2).

2. Mbuye ndinam'pempha mundipulumutse
Kudikira kwanga kunali kwa phindu
Yesu wanditola anandikokera
Pachifuwa chake (nandipatsa mtendere *2).

3. Ndidziwa Ambuye yemwe andikonda
Wandifunafuna nandifera ine.
Kwa iye ndipuma kumachimo anga
Mwayi ndaupeza (Yesu wanditola *2).

title: Atate wanga ndakulakwirani
otherDetails:
137 NAH
Dear father, I have sorely sinned

verses:
1. Atate wanga ndakulakwirani ndachimwa pamaso panu
Tchimo langa landimanga m'ndende (ndikumvatu, kupweteka *2).

2. Mukudziwa mavuto anga onse ndi nsozi ndidza kwa
Inu Mbuye wanga ndipilire chotani (kusaona nkhope yanu *2).

3. Mbuye musalipire tchimo langa musaweruze mulandu
Tsiku ntsiku ndifunafuna inu (chifukwa ndinu chikondi *2).

4. Ambuye ndidzatsatira mokondwa kutitu ndikapumule
Tsiku ntsiku kukukondani inu (ndikutsamira kwa inu *2).

title: Pansi pa mtima ndilira
otherDetails:
138 NAH
Out of the depths I cry to Thee

verses:
1. Pansi pa mtima ndilira Ambuye ndimvereni tcherani makutu ₺
Mumve kupemphera kwanga mukakumbuka machimo
Mukabwezera chilango. Ndaniyo angaime,

2. Tipempha chikondi chanu mutiveke chisomo ntchito
Sizichotsa tchimo. Moyo watikanika wina atamanda ntchito
Ana atama chisomo chomwe ndi chilungamo.

3. Ndiyembekeza Ambuye n'chifuniro changa
Ndidalira mau ake ndi mzimu wolapadi iyeyo
Ndiwachifundo. Ali chitonthozo changa ndidikira thandizo.

4. Ndidikiratu usiku ndidikira m'mamawa ndidalira
Mphamvu zanu. Sindidzakunyozani, inu ayisalayeli inu obadv
Mwa mzimu dikirani Mulungu.

5. Kuchuruka kwa machimo chisomo nchochuruka
Chikondi sichilephera tikapepha moona
Iye ndu mbusa wabwino adzawombola isi-ra-eli
Machimo ndi m'zisoni.

title: Nyenyezi ili pakati kutiunikira
otherDetails:
139 NAH.
There dawns a star, so clear and bright.

verses:
1. Nyenyezi ili pakati kutiunikira ife
Ulemelero wanu
Ndinu nyali ya chifundo mundilimbitse
N'sajiwe ndi mano asatana.
Munditenge ndifuna kudza kwa inu
Ndikupempha chikhululukiro chanu.

2. Mtima wonyada chotsani mundimasule
Ambuye ku machimo adziko.
Ndikhale odzichepetsa ndikhale muchoonadi
Kugwira ntchito yanu.
Ndipatseni chikhulupiriro chanu ndi khalidwe
Lokondweretsa Mulungu.

3. Mvekeni moyo wanga zobvala zanu zoyera
Kunka moyo wosatha
Mphamvu yopezeka mwazi yotsuka ndikudalitsa
Itsogoza kumudzi.
Thandizeni Yesu mwini chikondi kuti ndisagwe
Kopanda'nu ndi mwalira.

4. Mbuye muwale mwa ine ndilalikire za inu
Ndi chikhulupiriro
Ndidzatsata njira yanu chisomo ndi ndodo yanga
Inu simulephera
Mpulumutsi ndilonjeze kukhala nanu kwa m'yaya
Kuyamikira kwa m'yaya.

title: Ndimachimo
otherDetails:
140 NAH.
With the same transgressions

verses:
1. Ndi machimo anga ndibwere kodi?
Kupilirira nane simunatope?
Kodi chifundocho ndi chatsopano
mudzandikhululukira machimo?

2. Ndikapempha inu ndipenya nkhope
Ndipenya chifundo ndinso chisomo
Ndi chikondi chanu Mbuye ndadala.
Konse konse kulibe chikondichi.

3. Chikhululukiro ndi mau anu
Ndizo moyo wanga zachotsa tsoka
Mtendere upatsa chipulumutso
Pokhala mdziko mundidalitse.

title: Ndi mtima wolapa ndidza kwa inu
otherDetails:
340NEH
With contrite heart I come to Thee.

verses:
1. Ndi mtima wolapa ndidza kwa inu Mbuye
Komwe Yesu anafera kuchotsa machimo
Mithenga ya anthu ndiyi : chisomo chilipo
Atsegula Mparadiso kudzakuwombola.

2. Mongatu wopemphapempha ndadza ndi machimo
Koma pamene ndalapa mundikhululukire
Ndadza ndizosayenera ndine wovutika Mbuye
mundipulumutse mundigwire dzanja.

3. Iye wakudza kwa inu sabwezedwa konse
Inenso ndikupemphani Mbuye mundimvere
Yesu Khristu mwazi wanu wandipulumutsa
Unditsuka mkatikati ndapeza mtendere.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Musandibisire nkhope yanu Mbuye
M'churutse chisomo kuti ndiyanjane nanu.

title: M'sandipitilire Yesu
otherDetails:
333NEH
Pass Me not, O Gentle Saviour

verses:
1. M'sandipitilire Yesu, mundimveretu
M'mene muitana ena, m'sandipitilire.

2. Ku m'pando wa chisomowo, ndi tonthozedwe
Ndi gwadira inu Mbuye, mundithandize.

3. Ndi khulupilira inu, nkhope yanuyo
Mu chiritsa Mzimu wanga, m'ndipulumutse.

4. Inu ndinutu kasupe, wa chitonthozo
Sindifuna wina konse, koma inutu.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: M'pulumutsi, mundimveretu
M'mene muitana ena
M'sandipitilire.

title: Mbuye wanga tengani mtimawu
otherDetails:
244NEH
Here is my heart

verses:
1. Mbuye wanga tengani mtimawu mwapanga nchisomo
Mwana wanga ukane dzikoli ndimva mau ako
Tengani mphatso ya chikondi Mulungu wanga mudalitse
Mtima wanga mtima wanga.

2. Mtima wanga m'landire n'chifundo ngakhale ngoipa
Ndipereka n'chikondi choona mwa chisomo chanu
Ndiwodetsedwa ndi zoipa ndiwodzazidwa ndi machimo
Mtima wanga mtima wanga.

3. Mtima wanga ngokwana mwa Khristu ntanda uli m'fupi
Mbuye wanga inu chuma changa ndinu moyo wanga
Uli ndi mabala amkati madalitso ndi chitonthozo
Mtima wanga mtima wanga.

title: Tidza kwanu Mfumu yathu
otherDetails:
144 NAH
We come before Thy majesty

verses:
1. Tidza kwanu Mfumu yathu tikugwadirani
Kokani Mitima yathu kufika paguwa
Mtipatse Chisomo chanu mchotse tchimo lathu lonse
Msabisetu nkhope yanu muombole ochimwayo
Msatisale ifetu ochimwa.

2. Monga mwana osochera nafe tachimwadi
Tachoka mchikondi chanu mtikhululukire
Mtipatse chikondi chanu musunge,Mtima ochimwa
Msabisetu nkhope yanu tikondwera mchisomocho
Mkuwalako kwa inu Ambuye.

3. Munalenga zinthu zonse kukhala thandizo
Mumaperekanso mphamvu kwa anu ofoka
Tipereka chiyamiko tisambitsidwe mumwazi
Kudzera mwamwana wanu taomboledwa mumwazi
Muchikondi mudzi wakonzedwa.

title: Kasupe oyera wachisomo
otherDetails:
315NEH
Fountain of purity

verses:
1. Kasupe oyera wachisomo, owombola onse ochimwawo
Yesu Mpulumutsi wa ochimwa, ndisambitseni ndiyeretu mbee

2. Ngakhale ndiri kugwira ntchito, sindingathe kudziyeretsatu
Yesu Mpulumutsi wa ochimwa, ndisambitseni ndiyeretu mbee

3. Kasupe wanu Mbuye ngoyera, atsuke ayereste mtimanga
Zonse ndipempha Mbuye ndizanu, mndisambitse ndikhale oye:
lyrics.chorus: Chorus: (Ndiyere mbee *2), Ndikhale oyeratu mbee.

title: Muli malo mchisomo cha Mlungu
otherDetails:
304NEH
158NAH
There is still room in God's great mercy

verses:
1. Muli malo mchisomo cha Mlungu a mtima wanga osweka
Mtima wangau wamasuka kuti ndilowe kumwamba
Mpulumutsi mnditengere (kumalo a mtenderewo *2).

2. Muli malo mchikondi chanu ndalandiradi kwa inu
Mchipiliro ndilungamitsidwa nyumba ya tate ndifuna
Ndidzagwira dzanja lache (kunditengera kumwamba *2).

3. Muli malo mkhola lankhosa a mizimu yosochera
Kukhalilira kugwiritsa ndicho chifuniro chanu
Mpulumutsi bwenzi langa (ndiye ndikhulupilira *2).

4. Muli malo a banja langa phwando landikonzedwera
Wochimwayo wamasulidwa kutitu asatayike,
Ndimva kuitana kwanu ( choncho ndidzatu kwa inu *2).

title: Muli malo mnyumba ya Mulungu!
otherDetails:
160 NAH
There still is room! God's house is not yet filled

verses:
1. Muli malo mnyumba ya Mulungu chakudya nchambiri
Chakonzedwa anjala akhute zonse nzanu Mbuye
Pitanitu mukawatenge alowe munyumba ya Mbuye
Muli malo muli malo.

2. Nthawi iripo lalikirani Chikondi cha Mbuye
Muitane alendo mnyumbayi mutamande iye
Khomo lachisomo liripo pomwe Mlungu atidalitsa
Muli malo muli malo.

3. Konzekani ola layandika lofikira Mkwati
Ndipo nthawi yachisomo *dzatha Mkwati adzafika
Iwe Mkwatibwi konzekera ulandire Mbuye wakoyo
Nthawi yache yafikadi.

title: Ku chokera ku m'pando
otherDetails:
279NEH
Fresh from the Throne of Glory

verses:
1. Kuchokera ku m'pando, wache wachifumu
Kuchokera ku kasupe, wa madzi a moyo
M'tsinje wodalatu, ndidyetse maso anga
M'tsinje wodalatu, ndidyetse maso anga.

2. Kasupe wa umoyo, wa chisangalalo
Azeze aimbako, nyimbo zimvekadi
Ndikhaletu ndiimbe, pafupi ndi iwe
Ndikhaletu ndiimbe, pafupi ndi iwe

3. M'tsinje wa Mulungu wanga ndikulonjerani
Moyo wanga m'madziwo atha ludzu langa
M'tsinje woyera ndimwe, madzi amoyowo,
M'tsinje woyera ndimwe, madzi amoyowo.

title: Mabelu aulaliki aimba dziko lonse
otherDetails:
283NEH
Hark! the Gospel bells are ringing

verses:
1. Mabelu aulaliki aimba dziko lonse
Anena zachipulumutso cha iwe ndi cha ine
Titame chikondi chache potitumira mwana
Yense omkhulupilira sadzafa mpaka myaya.

2. Mabeluwa aitana tikalowe kuphwando
Tikalandire thandizo latonsefe ochimwa
Yesu ndiyetu chakudya cha mizimu yanjala
Kubweretsa chilimbitso kumitima yofooka.

3. Lolani mtima wangau udzale ndi choona
Kuti ndithe kugonjetsa mphamvu ya satanayo
Kuti achoke mwaine chifukwa cha ungwiro
Kudzera m'mphamvu za Yesu zopatsidwa kwa ine.

4. Mabelu atilozera kunyimbo yatsopano
Ana a Mlungu bwerani tikondwe ndioyera
Posachedwa Mfumu idza tikhale okonzeka
Mkhale okhulupilika mudzavala korona.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Mabelu aimba dziko lonse amveka
Adza ndi uthenga wabwino kwa tonsefe.

title: Yesu ali kuitana iwe
otherDetails:
290NEH
Jesus is calling the lost ones

verses:
1. Yesu ali kuitana iwe, ''osochera, osochera''
Tuluka mumdima wa uchimo
Akupatsa chifundo.

2. Yesu apulumutsa otopa, ''apumule, apumule,''
Bwera nawo akatundu ako, Akupatsa chisomo.

3. Yesu ali kudikira iwe, ''ochimwa'we, ochimwe'we''
Watembenuka usachedwetu, bweratu ochimwa'we.

4. Yesu akuyembekezera leroli. ''mvera iye, mvera iye''
Ukakhulupiliratu iye, adzakhala okondwa.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Aitana, aitana, Yesu
Ali kuitana iwe tsopano.

title: Ndidziwa zamtsinje onyezimira
otherDetails:
288NEH
I know of a fountain so sparkling

verses:
1. Ndidziwa zamtsinje onyezimira omwe umathetsa ludzu
Mwa Atumwi ache a Yesu Khristu mudzapeza kasupeyu.

2. Imwa Mzimu odzazidwa ndi ludzu akuitana mchikondi
Omwe ayeretsedwa mkasupeyu apata moyo osatha.

3. Idzanitu nonse anthu ochimwa Yesu akulilirani
Muomboli akukondani nonsenu koditu simudzasitha.
lyrics.chorus:
Ten & Alt : Kukasupe wache odzalatu ndichisomo.
Sap: Dzani
Bass: Dzani dzani kukasupe

title: Ndidziwa mtsinje wa ulemelero
otherDetails:
289NEH
I know of a river whose glorious stream

verses:
1. Ndidziwa m'tsinje wa ulemelero
Madzi ache a m'tendere
Mtsinje wa pamwamba onyezimira
Ndani awudziwa lero?

2. Monse madzi amoyowo adutsa
Mukhala chisangalalo
Yense wakumwa madziwa apeza
Mtendere mumtima wache.

3. M'tsinje ngwakuya madzi ngoyera
Upeputsa mtima wako
Uchiritsa odwala ndi amantha
Ngakhale anthu ankhanza.

4. Yesu ndiyetu Madzi amoyowa
Iye samasintha konse
Mwazi wache oyeretsedwawo
Unathikira ochimwa.

5. Yense waludzu adze ndikumwako
Mzimu wache uitana
Osamba ndi kumwa madziwa
Adzakhala mwa Mlungu kwamyaya.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Dzani kum'tsinjewu lero
Kuti muwomboledwetu
Ndinso mazi ache ngauleledi
Atsitsimutsa mitima.

title: Zinthu zonse ndiri nazo
otherDetails:
177 NAH
All I have is Thine, Lord Jesus

verses:
1. Zinthu zonse ndiri nazo ndizanu Mbuye wanga
Ndigwada pamaso panu ndigonjera kwa inu
Ndiyang'anire kwa inu. Inu nokha mtsogoze
(Ndimau anga Ambuye ndidzakukwezanitu*2).

2. Zokoma zamdziko lino ziribe phindu konse
Ngakhale moyo ukome ndimangidwe mchisomo
Pamtanda ndiona Khristu akhetsa mwazi wache
(Ndigwadira Mlungu wanga pondiombola ine *2).

3. Ndifuna inutu Mbuye ndipembedza inutu
Mndikhumbatire mchifundo ndimve chisomo chanu
Nchodabwitsa kwaochimwa kupuma mwa Yesuyo
(Ndidzaima monga iye ogonjetsa dzikoli *2)

title: Bwera kwa Atate wako
otherDetails:
184 NAH
Come to the Father's Dwelling

verses:
1. Bwera kwa Atate wako, iwe wosochera
Mpulumutsi wako, akuitana iwe.

2. Dziko la uchimo, lilibe mtendere
Bweratu mwanawe, kwa Yesu udzapume.

3. Ngakhale walephera, mumachimo ako
Bwera ndi akatundu, ako adzatula.

4. Bwera kwa wolema, iwe
Bwera kwa Atate wako, mabvuto adzatha.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Bwera ! bwera ! siya zochimwazo
Bwera ! bwera ! imva kuitana.

title: Bwera kwa Mpulumutsiyo
otherDetails:
276NEH
Come to the Saviour

verses:
1. Bwera kwa Mpulumutsiyo
Imvani mau ache lero
Ali pafupi kudalitsa, bwera aitana.

2. Mvani mau ache ananu
M'patseni mtima wanu lero
Ali wosankhidwa m'mwambamo, dzikonzekereni.

3. Amvere mapemphero anu
Ali ndi inu pafupitu
Adzakupatsani chisomo, wochimwa bweratu.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Kukumana mokondweradi
Ku uchimo tamasulidwa
Tidzalowatu mu kenani
Wosankhidwa bwera

title: Chikondi ndichotu
otherDetails:
585NEH
193 OLD HYMNAL FRONT
Blest be the Tie that Binds

verses:
1. Chikondi ndichotu, chiyanjanitsa'fe
Mwa Khristu tidza-imbabe, kufika m'mwambamo.

2. Tipempha kwa Atate, wosunga tonsefe
Chikhulupiliro chathu, nchimodzi mwa Atumwi.

3. Tithandizanadi, m'zovuta, m'zolema
Misozi yathu ikugwa, mukuthandizana.

4. M'mene tilekana, chisomokwa ife
Mu mzimu tiri pamodzi, tidzaonananso.

title: Imba kawiri kwa ine
otherDetails:
310NEH
Wonderful words of Life

verses:
1. Imba kawiri kwa ine, mau amoyowo
Ndione ubwino wache, mau a moyowo
Mau a umoyo andiphunzitsadi
Abwinowo, odabwitsa, mau amoyowo
Abwinowo, odabwitsa, mau amoyowo.

2. Khristu apatsa kwa onse, mau amoyowo
Mvera mau a chikondi, mau amoyowo
Atipatsa ife cha ulere chache
Abwinowo, odabwitsa, mau amoyowo
Abwinowo, odabwitsa, mau amoyowo.

3. Mu uthenga aitana, mau amoyowo
Akhululukira onse, mau amoyowo
Yesu Mpulumutsi, mtiyeretse ife
Abwinowo, odabwitsa, mau amoyowo
Abwinowo, odabwitsa, mau amoyowo.

title: Yemwe akumva afuuletu
otherDetails:
308NEH
Whosoever Will

verses:
1. Yemwe akumva afuuletu, kumadzi a moyo 'dzani nonsenu
Mwa Khristu ludzu lidzatha phe, yemwe afuna, adze.

2. Yemwe akumva amve mauwo, wodala yemwe asunga mauwo
Chipulumutso ndi chisomo chache, yemwe afuna, adze.

3. Yemwe akumva asachedwetu, tembenukani mtima nthawi ino
Mau a Yesu alitu ndi moyo, yemwe afuna, adze.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Akumva ludzu, akumva njala
Yesu mwa Atumwi ati idzani
Khomo lachisomo latsegukadi
Yemwe afuna adze.

title: Pa mapazi ache a Yesu
otherDetails:
74NEH
At the Feet of Jesus

verses:
1. Pa mapazi ache a Yesu Mbuye
Timva mau ache tilimbitsidwa
Atipatsa mphamvuzo ndi maraya oyera.

2. Mu mau a Yesu ndiyeretsedwa
Nsinga za satana zimasulidwa
Ndipatsidwa chisomo mtima wanga ukondwa.

3. Nthawizo zabwino zikhala ndine
Pamene Mulungu andidalitsa
Andichiritsa ine ndikhala woyera mbee!!.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Pa mapazi ache a Yesu Mbuye
Pali malo anga ndi mau ache.

title: Ndiyamika chikondi chache
otherDetails:
376NEH
I Praise God's Love

verses:
1. Ndiyamika chikondi chache
Choonetesedwa ndi Khristu
Ndigonjera ku mau ache
Ndinakhululukidwatu
Ndichotsa maganizo anga
Mwachikondi chache chosatha

2. Muli wachifundo kwa ine
Chikondi ndi mtima wanga
Ndiwerama pamaso panu
Ndi zonsenzo ndiri nazo
Chikondi cha Mulungu wanga
Ndasankhidwa kukhala wache

3. Mtima wanga ndikupatsani
Momboli wanga wabwino
Muli wachifundo cha moyo
Mwa chipulumutso changa
Mwa ndiombola ku uchimo
Ndikupatsani mtima wanga

4. Dzina lache la Yesu Mbuye
Lilembedwe mu mtimamu
M'chikondicho cha Yesu Mbuye
Atate awonekera
Muchikhalidwe changa chonse
Yesu Mbuye awonekera

5. M'dzina lache la Yesu Mbuye
Atate awonekera
Kasupe wa mu mtenderewo
Ayendabe lero lino
Ochimwawo akanadziwa
Akanafuna Kasupeyu

title: Ndidze pafupipa
otherDetails:
234NAH
Nearer, my God, to Thee

verses:
1. Ndidze pafupi, Mlungu wanga !
Ngakhale pa mtanda, mundikweza
Koma ndi-imbabe, Mbuye m'ndikhalitse
Mbuye m'ndikhalitse, m'fupi ndi inu.

2. Ngakhale ku thengo, ndasochera
Mu mdima ndigona e-pa mwala
Koma m'kulotako, ndiyandikizanso
Ndiyandikizanso, m'fupi ndinu.

3. Pajapo ndipenya, pokwerapo
Angelo atsika, kumwambako
Ndiwo akodola, kuti ndikabwere
Kuti ndi kabwere, m'fupi ndinu.

4. Tsono poukanso, wokondwatu
Ndipeza pomwepo, pali Mulungu
Ndipo masautso, andisendezanso
Andisendezanso, m'fupi ndinu.

5. Pena pakufadi, mkwera m'mwamba
Dzuwa ndi nyenyezi, zitsatira
Pomwe ndiimbanso, ndidza pafupipa
Ndidza pafupipa, Mulungu wanga.

title: Onani ndikweza Manja
otherDetails:
260NEH
See, I spread my arms in yearning

verses:
1. Onani ndikweza manja, maso anga kwa inu
Modzichepetsa ndipempha dzani mkhale mwa ine.

2. Mundipatsetu chakudya kwezani chuma changa
Ulendowu ngolemetsa ndipatseni mpumulo.

3. Ndiribe chokupatsani mu umphawi, m'matenda
Ndidza kuphwando lanulo, mmphamvu yanu ndikhuta.

4. Ndidziwadi muli nane, ndiri wanu kwatunthu
Mau anu saadzasintha ndiri wanu kwamyaya.

5. Mndipatse chisomo chanu ndimachiritso anu
Mndidzadze ndi chuma chanu m'walitse mtima wanga.

title: Ndiweramitsa nkhope
otherDetails:
236NEH
Before My Hearts King Bowing

verses:
1. Ndiweramitsa nkhope, ndipereka mphatso,
Ngakhale ndi zochepa, Mfumu ikondwera
Chifuniro changacho, m'njira ya imfayi
Kwaniritsani Mbuye, chifuniro chanu.

2. Sindidzatopa konse, ndinso kukhumudwa
Ndi mtima okondwa, n'dzadalira Iye
Anataya moyowo, anakhetsa mwazi
Adzandipatsa ine, zabwino zache

3. Ngodzala n'chifundo, ndinso ndi chisomo
Ungachimwe motani, adzakulandira
Mchikondi cha muyaya, adzandikonza'ne
Ndidzamtsata mmapazi, kufika kumudzi

4. M'ndiyang'anire'ne mwana olefuka
Ndiyang'ana kwanu, kufunatu mphavu
Ndiika manja anga mdzanja lanu Mbuye
Ndidziwa mnditengera kudziko la tate

title: Nthawitu ya kupemphera
otherDetails:
261NEH
Sweet hour of prayer

verses:
1. Nthawitu ya kupemphera, indichotsa ku dzikoli
Ndidza ku mpando wa 'tate, ndiulula zanga zonse
Munthawi za mabvutowo, moyo wanga upumula
Ndichotsedwa ku misampha, panthawi ya kupemphera.

2. Nthawitu ya kupemphera, ndiika pemphero langa
Iye wokhulupirika, adalitsa moyo wanga
Ndionetu nkhope yache, khulupira mau ache
Nditula zonse kwa iye, panthawi ya kupemphera.

3. Nthawitu ya kupemphera, ndikhale mchifundo chanu
Paphiri lalitalilo, ndione nyumba yangayo
Ndidzasiya thupi ili, kuthamangira korona
Ndidzatsazika nthawiyi, nthawitu ya kupemphera.

title: Tengani moyo wanga
otherDetails:
106NEH
Take my life

verses:
1. Tengani moyo wanga ukhale wanu Mbuye
Nthawi masiku anga zitamanda kwa myaya
Maso anga awone ubwino wanu Mbuye
Khutu langa limveka mau anu okoma

2. Tengani manja anga ayende monga mfuna
Phazi langa liyende, mwachangu mokongola
Mau anga aimbe kwa mfumu yanga myaya
N'tsira chikondi changa pamapazi anuwo

3. Tengani chuma changa, sin'dzabisako kanthu
Nzeru zanga zigwire ntchito monganu mfuna
Mtenge zokhumba zanga, zikhale zanu Mbuye
Tengani mtima wanga ukhale mpando wanu

title: Kwa m'yaya ndi Mbuye
otherDetails:
178NEH
For ever with the Lord

verses:
1. Kwa myaya ndi Mbuye, chifuniro changa
Mau ache ndi nyenyezi, anditsogolera
M'dziko ndabvutika, ndikhalatu mlendo
Ndiyendetsa hema wanga Mbuye ali mfupi
Mfupinu mfupi 'nu, Mbuye ali mfupi.

2. Ndiyang'ana m'mwamba, mudzi ukodola
Potsatira 'tsogoleri, ndiona mudziwo
Ndifuna kupuma, mumudzi wa mmwamba
Kugawana chikondicho, mdziko lodalalo
Chikondi chikondi, mdziko lodalo,

3. Ngakhaletu maso anga saonatu
Monga nkhunda m'chombo chija, ndithawira kwache
Mitambo ichoka, namondwe apita
Kubweretsa mtenderewo, ndi chitonthozocho,
Mtendere, mtendere, unditonthozadi.

4. Pochoka m'sautso, moyo umasuka
Ndichokeratu ku imfa, ndikhala okondwa
Ine ndidzaona, kukongola kwanu
Ndidzakhalatu ndi Iye, kwa myaya ndi Mbuye
Mokondwa, mokondwa, kwa m'yaya ndi Mbuye.

title: Kwa Yesu kuli Kasupe
otherDetails:
348NEH
From Jesus' Love the Fountain Pure

verses:
1. Kwa Yesu kuli Kasupe, kuchoka madzi abwino
Amoyo ndi wochiritsa, athetsa ludzu langa.

2. Pomva kuyenda kwa madzi, mitima isenderatu
Kuti imveretu mau, ochotsa zowawa zonse

3. Kasupeyo wa chisomo, anditonthoza mu mtima
Ndatsukidwa ku zoipa, kukhala wa kumwambako.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Mtsinje wache wa chisomo, tipulumukemo
Mtsinje wache wa chisomo, ndaomboledwatu.

title: Mtima wanga yang'ana
otherDetails:
408NEH
Forth, Forth my Heart to Heaven

verses:
1. Mtima wanga yang'ana, yang'ana kumwamba
Mulibe kupumula, mu dziko linotu
Komwe mwana wa nkhosa wakonza malo athu
Uliko m'pumulo, yang'ana kumwamba.

2. Ngati ndiwe kapolo, dzimasule wekha
Khristu anagonjetsa zopweteka zako
Penya mbendera yache, apulumutsa onse
Uko udzapuma, yang'ana kumwamba.

3. Ndinutu odabwitsa, Mwana wa nkhosa'nu
Ndasowadi mapiko, ndikana-uluka
Kukakondwera naye, ndi osankhidwa ache
Ndi chikondi chache, yang'ana kumwamba.

4. Chifuniro chanucho, chikhale cha ine
Ndichite chifuniro chimene mufuna
Ndizayembekezadi, kundi-itana kwanu
Dza-pumula kuno, yang'ana kumwamba.

title: Ndilimbikira chifukwa chachiombolo
otherDetails:
153NEH
Striving Onwards

verses:
1. Ndilimbikira chifukwa chachiombolo
Ndidzayesetsa kufikira ndi tapeza,
Ndidzataya zopinga chifukwa chalonjezo
Wokhalira mphotoyo adzalandira.

2. Kumpandowo wa Atate ndifulumira
Kuzengereza kumvera kumaononga
Wotopa mkulimbika atayanso korona
Zamudziko ndizachabe sindizifuna.

3. Yesu anditsogolera, kunka kumudzi
Ndikafoka Mzimu wanga mu'limbikitse
Munthawi ya mayeso ndipewa mabvutowo
Mundilimbikitse kuti ndi dzapambane.

4. Mumabvuto mundichotse ndiribe mphamvu
Mkufoka, kwa inu m'mwamba ndipeza mphamvu.
Mau anu ndi moyo andimasula ine
Mndilowetse mu'lemelero wosalema.

title: Mulungu ali ndi Ine
otherDetails:
188NEH
If God Himself is for Me

verses:
1. Mulungu ali ndi ine, sindiopa kathu
Ndikapemphatu iye, adani athawa
Khristu bwenzi langalo, chithandizo changa 
Onsewo andibvuta, sadzaonekanso.

2. Ndamanga pa maziko, mwazi wa Yesuyo
Chipulumutso changa, ndiye wo-onadi
Kopanda Mbuye wathu, zonse ziri chabe
Mphatso zonse za Yesu, wondikonda ine

3. Mzimu wache ukhala, mu mtima wo-ona
Posochera mtimawo, utonthozedwadi
Adalitsa ntchitozo, ine ndi-itana
'Atate' Osalema, woweruza m'mwamba

4. Mzimu wache unena, mau a mphamvudi
Wofunitsa m'mpumu;o, mwa Mlungu apeza
Mbuye wathu akonza, gawo langa-langa
Pofoka moyo wanga, m'mwamba muli mwanga

title: Ndi ndodo ya golide
otherDetails:
229NEH
With a golden staff in hand

verses:
1. Ndi ndodo ya golide, ndiyenda mu dzikoli
Yochokera kumwamba, kunditengera konko
Ndodo mchikhulupiriro, indisunge m'chipiliro
Ngakhale imfa idze, ndikhala ndi ndodoyi

2. Mungelo wa kumwamba, monga mwana wa M'lungu
M'chimwemwe aphunzitsa, chifuniro cha Mbuye
Usachoke ku chikondi, chochokeratu kumwamba
Abale, tidzakhala, ndi M'lungu kwa muyaya

3. Nyenyezi kumwambako, iwala modabwitsa
Kuwala kokodola, mtima wanga ukondwa.
Indiyembekezeretsa, kumwambako kutseguka
Itengereko onse, odalira mbuyeyo

title: Ndifuna Yesuyo Ambuyeyo
otherDetails:
245NEH
I need the every hour

verses:
1. Ndifunanu yesu, Ambuyeyo,
Muli mtenderewo, m'mawu anu.

2. Ndifunanu Yesu, m'mabvutomo
Mayesi achoka mfupi ndinu.

3. Ndifunanu Yesu, mokondwadi
Mukhale ndi ine, mu moyowu.

4. Ndifunanu Yesu, ndiphunzire
Kukwaniritsadi lonjezano.

5. Ndifunanu Yesu, woyeratu
Ndikhale tu wanu odalanu.
lyrics.chorus:
Chorus: Ndifuna inu Yesu, kunthawi zosatha 
Ndidalitseni ine, ndidza kwanu

title: Moyo wanga khala mwa Mulungu
otherDetails:
223NEH
Wait my soul and tarry

verses:
1. Moyo wanga khala mwa Mulungu
Adzakuthandiza zolema zako
Uopa, u-bvutika bwanji
M'mawa wayandika, nthawi zisintha
Muchimphepocho mu kudwala
Mbuye adalitsa moyo wanga

2. Moyo wanga khala mwa Mulungu
Adzakuthandiza zolema zako
Polephera zinthu zonsezo
Adzakuyendetsa mchigwa cha mdima
Mbuye wanyaya mndiyendetse
Khristu mundipulumutse ine

3. Moyo wanga khala mwa Mulungu
Adzakuthandiza zochimwa zako
Adzakumasula iwetu
Potha kwa moyowu
Mukupumula mu mabvuto mu njirayo
Tsata mokondwa Mlungu wako
